identity.name: rravin
identity.mission: Transform raw data into executive intelligence with zero friction.

usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Weight 700 or 900 for H1/H2.
usage_rules.body: Use IBM Plex Sans. Tracking normal. High legibility for data.
usage_rules.data_cells: Use JetBrains Mono for tabular numbers to ensure alignment.

rules.no_gradients_text: Do not use gradients on text for readability.
rules.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
rules.glass: Use bg-black/60 with backdrop-blur-xl for overlays.

strategies.bento_grid: Use for dashboard. Mix col-span-1, col-span-2, and row-span-2 items.
strategies.f_pattern: Place key metrics top-left. Navigation on left sidebar.
strategies.density: High density for data views. Use h-full to stretch cards.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,122,255,0.3)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-md border border-white/10

inputs.style: bg-secondary border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for the file upload container to signal 'active' state.
visual_enhancers.grid_borders: Use for data tables. border-r border-b border-white/5.
visual_enhancers.noise: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the background (opacity 0.03).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add Manrope and IBM Plex Sans via Google Fonts or Fontsource.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and font families defined above.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Update /src/components/ui files to remove default 'zinc' styles and apply the 'Performance Pro' palette.
4. BUILD LAYOUT: Create a Layout component that handles the sidebar and main content area with the 'F-Pattern'.
5. IMPLEMENT CHARTS: Use Recharts. Ensure tooltips have high contrast (dark bg, white text).
6. FILE UPLOAD: Build the file upload area with the 'Tracing Beam' effect.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
8. NO TRANSPARENT BG: Ensure dropdowns and modals have solid or blurred backgrounds, never transparent.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are recommended.
